title: Interpretation of hallucinations in a dream: A person has a hallucination in a dream

preview.html: Speech and hallucinations during sleep are a metaphor for seeing images of people we do not know or perhaps know or hearing strange voices, and this is the result of the noise of life and the many problems and things that a person experiences every day. What does a dream about a hallucination mean? A dream about an illusion is a message sent by the consciousness and the subconscious plays a role in its appearance. This dream symbolizes a group of ideas, problems, and crowding of people in your life and you are thinking about them at the same time. It shows that you are interested in many things that you cannot find a solution to. You are also tired. You are exhausted and need a lot of rest, which you cannot get thanks to the pressures of life. How do you get rid of a hallucinatory dream? You cannot get rid of this dream unless you follow the following steps: Try to divide your time well during the day and do not link all your tasks to each other, but it is better To set a specific time for everything. Keep calm and do not make your diary full of anger and crowding. Instead, train yourself to be calm so that you know how to react when problems arise. So give yourself time, even if it is short, to relax and rest away from thinking about annoying things. Interpretation of seeing a hallucination - The YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an engineer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an engineer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream about seeing an engineer in a dream, the meaning of engineer in a dream for a single married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man, signs of marriage to an engineer, the symbol of an architect, seeing an engineer is the office, and engineer is the title given to everyone who studied engineering and excelled in it He has many specializations: architect, civil engineer, mechanical engineer, etc. Seeing him in our dreams, we are confused about his interpretation, and therefore we will find out today through the interpretation of the engineer’s vision of the dream in detail in this article.Interpretation of the engineer’s dream in a dream: The interpretation of seeing the smiling engineer in a dream is evidence of reconstruction, prosperity, well-being, and the fulfillment of ambitions, ambitions, and achievements. An engineer's dream. Frowning in a dream indicates destruction, loss, corruption, the dominance of failure and despair over the dreamer, and a change in his condition for the worse. Seeing a mechanic doing his work in a dream means that circumstances are changing for the better, from poverty to wealth and from illness to recovery. The interpretation of working in an engineer’s office in a dream shows that the dreamer is a person governed by principles, values, and morals. Seeing a person who has become an engineer in a dream is evidence of influence, power, and reaching the highest positions and status among people. Dreaming of seeing an architect in a dream is desirable, because it indicates ownership of real estate and land and obtaining a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing an architect for a single woman: The dream interpretation of an architect in a single woman’s dream generally indicates that she will soon marry a wealthy and generous person who matches her generosity and morals. . Seeing working with an architect in a dream for a single woman is an indication that she is a kind, innovative, kind and gentle girl among people, and dreaming of a groom in a single woman’s dream indicates that she is married to a person who is in good condition and that he has a lot of money and will be very happy with it. Seeing unmarried women working in an engineer’s office in a dream means that she has achieved what she wants and aspires to in her personal and professional life. The dream of seeing a married engineer in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she will get a lot of money through a new job. Interpretation of the engineer’s dream for the married woman: The interpretation of the engineer’s dream for the married woman is generally considered unpleasant visions that indicate many fears, sorrows, and problems. The dream of a mechanic at home in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is in a bad psychological state and does not feel happy in her life. Seeing a mechanical repair medicine in a married woman’s dream may indicate her efforts to support her family and children and overcome problems and disagreements with her husband. Seeing a married woman working in an engineering office is evidence of his desire to make many new friends. The dream of seeing a husband becoming an engineer in a married woman’s dream. Interpretation of seeing an engineer for a pregnant woman: Seeing a mechanic in a pregnant woman’s dream in the first months is evidence that she will herald childbirth and will have many children in the future. I dream that I work with an engineer in a pregnant dream. This indicates that her life

title: Interpretation of a dream about a goat by Ibn Sirin regarding good and evil

preview.html: Through our article today, we will provide you with the interpretation of seeing goats in a dream. The first thing the dreamer looks for is the interpretation of the dream he saw in order to know its meanings, because some dreams come as a warning to their owner, and some come as good news, and they may come as a result of pressure or confusion in the dreamer. The mind, and because in the world of dream interpretation, interpretations vary depending on the dreamer, everyone searches for an interpretation of the dream for him. Therefore, through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will show you different interpretations of seeing a goat in a dream for a man, a married woman, and a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a goat by Ibn Sirin. In the following lines, we will present to you a number of different interpretations that dream interpretation scholars came up with, including Ibn Sirin, and then we will explain to you The effects of this dream are in the dream of every fortuneteller. Seeing a goat in a dream means that the dreamer has insight into one of the matters. When you see a goat in a dream, it means that the dreamer will be able to achieve what he desires. If the dreamer sees a goat wandering in a garden in... His dream, it means that he must be careful in his dealings with others. Seeing a goat in a dream means that the dreamer is trying to get rid of the dark side of his life and that he will be able to achieve this. Seeing a goat in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer has a strong personality and an insightful vision of things. Seeing a small goat in a dream means that the dreamer will face some problems in his life and that he wants to return to his childhood again. When you see goats in a dream, it symbolizes salvation from enemies. If the dreamer sees in his dream that goats attack him and manage to injure him, this means that the dreamer He will have a successful romantic relationship. If the dreamer is facing a problem in his life and sees a goat in his dream, this means that he will be able to overcome these problems. Seeing a goat being slaughtered in a dream means that the dreamer will be saved from enemies, so it is a promising vision. When the dreamer sees a herd of goats Running outside the house in a dream, this indicates that good intentions come to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a goat in a dream: A goat in a dream shows the presence of enemies around the dreamer and means that he must be careful of them. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is riding a goat, this means that he will face some Risks in the coming days. Seeing goats in a dream may mean that the dreamer will enjoy financial stability in the coming period. A good dream is to see white goats in a dream, as this indicates that the dreamer will receive care and attention. Seeing goats on a farm in a dream may mean that the weather It will be moderate on unstable days. When the dreamer sees a goat on a mountain in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer is ambitious and seeks to achieve his goals. Seeing a goat in a dream climbing trees to eat from them symbolizes kindness and nourishment that the dreamer will receive. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is drinking Goat milk, this means that he will gain material and moral livelihood in the coming period. Seeing a herd of goats walking quietly in a dream means that the dreamer’s life is stable, and that he is successful and will be able to achieve

title: Interpretation of touching in a dream by jinn and devils in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: To meet me, the interpretation of touch in a dream for different situations by Ibn Sirin: “The jinn” is a word that raises feelings of fear and tension in many people as soon as they hear it, and they are not reassured except when they seek refuge in God Almighty from the jinn and their evils that can greatly affect a person, and seeing them. In a dream or mentioning their names causes severe panic, so a person often searches for an interpretation of his visions, fearing that it will be bad for him. Interpretation of touch in a dream Today we show you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of jinn and demons touching people in detail from the encyclopedia website, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn touching a woman Single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman touching her jeans in a dream means that this girl receives a lot of envy, hatred, and feelings of jealousy from those around her. If an unmarried woman sees that there is a jinn touching her while reciting the Qur’an, this is evidence of the strength of her faith and good deeds, and God Almighty will give her abundant goodness in a short period. When an unmarried woman sees that the jinn is touching one of her family members, this indicates that there are some disputes between them, but they will disappear soon and end, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees that the jinn is touching her lover or someone she is emotionally attached to, and that the jinn spoke to her in his voice while he was inside that person, then Seeing it is a confirmation of the evil of that person. And deception and the desire to harm her, so she must beware of him and stay away from him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a person being possessed by a jinn: Seeing a person shaking hands with jeans in a dream means that God Almighty will give him a lot of lawful money or that he will receive an important promotion at work. God knows best. Whoever dreams in a dream that jinn enter his body, his vision indicates that he is immersed in committing sins and seeking pleasures and far from the path of guidance and faith. The dreamer’s vision of the presence of jinn walking behind him indicates that there is a group of enemies waiting for him and planning to harm him in the near future. Therefore, God Almighty warned him to be careful and cautious. At this time not to exceed it. If one sees in a dream that there are individuals of the jinn standing around his house and in front of him, then his unpleasant vision warns him of an impending disaster or a big matter for him or it may be an indication that he will lose something important. In life. And if someone sees in a dream that two jinn entered his house and started talking to him, he and his house will be robbed because jinn always cause destruction and loss. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone wearing jeans. Seeing a person touched by jinn in a dream indicates the confusion and tension that the dreamer feels in the dream. This time, it is a sign of the turmoil in his practical and financial circumstances these days, which raises his great anxiety. This vision also indicates that this possessed person is deceiving the dreamer and manipulating him, so the dreamer must beware of him and stay away from bad friends who will only harm him in many ways. Sometimes this vision can indicate the annulment of the sin, failure to complete the marriage, or committing fraud, deception, theft, or what is wrong and deceiving people, knowing that the interpretation of the vision varies depending on the psychological, social, and material aspects. Case A

title: Interpretation of a dream about shaving my husband’s hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about shaving my husband’s hair in a dream. We will learn in the following lines about the interpretation of a dream about shaving my husband’s hair in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators, not personal interpretations and others.. Interpretation of a dream about shaving my husband’s hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about shaving my husband’s hair in a dream can be a sign of kindness and nourishment. If the dreamer sees himself shaving his hair, this may indicate the love that unites them, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees himself shaving her hair, it may express her intense love, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees himself shaving his hair, this may be a sign of the love that binds him to her, and God knows the unseen. The highest and most knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about cutting my girlfriend’s hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cutting my boyfriend’s hair in a dream could be a sign of love, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself cutting his girlfriend’s hair, this may lead to good changes, and God knows the unseen. Why did the dreamer see his brother’s wife with long hair in In a dream, this may be a sign of longevity, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my sister’s hair falling out in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the whale is an aquatic animal that is distinguished by its large size and distinctive shape. It has different interpretations, some of which are positive and promising, while others are negative, which indicates that the dreamer will face some problems. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a whale in a dream It indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many problems at work. Whoever sees in a dream that he is riding a whale and controlling it, his dream indicates that he will occupy an important position and stand away from danger. A vision of whaling indicates that the dreamer will exploit others and cause them harm. Whoever sees that He hunts a large whale, this means that he will achieve a lot of profit and profit in the coming period. If one dreams that a whale is sleeping in his bed, this means that the dreamer will be overwhelmed with sadness and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale in a dream, Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen, and from the point of view of the scholar Ibn Shaheen, if he sees A whale is chasing him and surrounding him from all sides, this is evidence that he is suffering from severe worries and pain. Seeing a whale in a dream may indicate the strength of the dreamer’s personality and his ability to achieve his ambitions and dreams, and it may indicate that he is introverted and isolated and wants to stay away from others. Among the warning dreams is the dream With the black whale, because it shows that the dreamer is far from God and commits many sins. It also indicates that he will be exposed to many interests and experiences. As for whoever sees himself inside a black whale, this is a sign of God’s satisfaction with the dreamer. Seeing a blue whale means that the dreamer will get rid of his problems and change his life in a positive way. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that if he dreams If a person sees a whale in his dream, this means that he is sad, lonely, and sad. Whoever sees that the whale in his dream has died, this is good news for him that he will soon hear good and happy news. Seeing a whale riding a whale and swimming with it quickly indicates that the dreamer will succeed in life. If he Someone dreams of a blue whale, the dream indicates that he will achieve the goals that he seeks and that he considered impossible. Seeing him killing a whale means that the dreamer will get rid of the obstacles and difficulties that he is experiencing in his life. Whoever sees that he is running from a whale and is afraid, this means that he is suffering From many problems, but he cannot face them and get rid of them. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale in a dream: If you see a whale in a dream for a single woman, this means that she will achieve her goals in life. If a single woman sees a brown whale in her dream, then her dream indicates that she will achieve something that she has been waiting for A long time ago. Whoever sees a whale swimming in his dream means that his problems will end soon. Seeing a whale attack in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the presence of a young man with bad morals who is proposing to her. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman seeing a whale in a dream. Seeing a whale in a married woman’s dream means that she She will soon become pregnant and give birth to a healthy child. preview.text: Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the whale is an aquatic animal that is distinguished by its large size and distinctive shape. It has different interpretations, some of which are positive and promising, while others are negative, which indicates that the dreamer will face some problems. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a whale in a dream It indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many problems at work. Whoever sees in a dream that he is riding a whale and controlling it, his dream indicates that he will occupy an important position and stand away from danger. A vision of whaling indicates that the dreamer will exploit others and cause them harm. Whoever sees that He hunts a large whale, this means that he will achieve a lot of profit and profit in the coming period. If one dreams that a whale is sleeping in his bed, this means that the dreamer will be overwhelmed with sadness and anxiety. Seeing a whale in a dream may indicate the strength of the dreamer’s personality and his ability to achieve his ambitions and dreams, and it may indicate that he is introverted and isolated and wants to stay away from others. Among the warning dreams is the dream With the black whale, because it shows that the dreamer is far from God and commits many sins. Whoever sees that he is running from a whale and is afraid, this means that he is suffering From many problems, but he cannot face them and get rid of them. title: Interpretation of the Maghrib prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream There is no doubt that prayer is the link between the servant and the Lord of God Almighty: {The believers who are submissive in their prayers will succeed} [verse 1 of Surat Al-Mu'minoon]. It is the highest, dearest and closest worship to God, and Maghrib prayer is one of the middle prayers. Which brings happiness and peace to those who maintain it, protects him from distress, and purifies him from sins. But Maghrib prayer in a dream has more than one interpretation and has different elements, and here is what was said about the best interpretation of the dream of Maghrib prayer, and here is what was said about its misinterpretation. For more information and clarifications, follow the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream Interpretation of the dream of Maghrib prayer by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned the interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream as evidence of alleviating anxiety and getting rid of worries and problems. And he interpreted the vision of performing Maghrib prayer and surrendering in a dream as evidence of paying off debts and fulfilling his need, as he explained that completing Maghrib prayer in a dream for a patient is evidence of overcoming difficulties. Rising in status and achieving success. He also explained that seeing the Maghrib prayer for a sick person in a dream indicates the end of his life, especially if he sees the sunset as evidence of death. He mentioned that seeing the prostration of the Maghrib prayer in a dream is evidence of jihad and suffering in good deeds to earn a legitimate livelihood. As for seeing the Maghrib prayer interrupted in a dream without disturbance, this is evidence that the dreamer does not insist on praying and follows his worldly instincts. Interpretation of a dream about the Maghrib prayer by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi narrates that the Maghrib prayer in a dream has two interpretations. Where he said that whoever sees that he is praying Maghrib in his sleep after sunset is a sign of response and fulfillment of what he wants, or a sign or warning of the death of one of his parents. Interpretation of a dream about Maghrib prayer in a dream for a single woman Prayer in general in a single person’s dream is evidence of peace, stability, peace, removal of worries, satisfaction of need, response to demands and arrival, as indicated by good morals, closeness to God and self-righteousness. As for Maghrib prayer specifically, it is a brief recitation of the Qur’an, completion of supplication, fulfillment of wishes, and achievement of success. Interpretation of a dream about Maghrib prayer in a dream for a married woman Prayer in general in a married woman’s dream indicates livelihood, money, kindness, relief from distress and worry, the blessing of life and the righteousness of her offspring. As for Maghrib prayer in particular, it indicates her care and interest in her husband and children and the intensity of her love for them and her preservation of them. Interpretation of a dream about Maghrib prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman Prayer in general in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the fulfillment of her demands and response to her supplication and her provision from God. As for Maghrib prayer in particular, it indicates a birth that will be easy, and a good sign that Her offspring will be righteous and among the pious, close to God, and those who maintain their prayers. Interpretation of a dream about the Maghrib prayer for a man If a man sees in his dream that he is praying the Maghrib prayer, this is evidence that he is a role model and a good example for society to follow and help others, and that he has many good deeds. And whoever sees in his dream that he is praying the Maghrib prayer facing the Qiblah, this is evidence of the abundance of

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person being upset with a living person

preview.html: It may seem that he is worried because of the horror and torture that he suffers in the grave, and we will learn together from our site an interpreter of the interpretation of the sadness of the deceased in a dream, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream about one girl Seeing the deceased mother upset and sad in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is falling behind her in Praying and visiting. Seeing the deceased father in a dream is upset and refuses to look at the dreamer’s face. It serves as a warning for her to stop the actions she is doing and get closer to Almighty God. A dead man’s reprimanding of an unmarried woman in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is doing wrong things that offend her. He must It warns against temptation and lust. The silence of a dead person in a dream is evidence of feelings of sadness and betrayal because the dreamer ignores his orders and goes against his approach, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a dead person asking about a living person. Interpretation of seeing an angry dead person in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees an unknown dead person in a dream, she She talks to her about his sadness. She is suffering in her life and does not feel comfortable because of the many problems and issues that surround her. If a woman sees her deceased husband upset in a dream, he does not talk to her. She talks bad about him, does not treat his family well, and does not urge her children to pray for him. And God knows best. Seeing a dead father upset in a dream means disobedience and a lot of sins and disobedience to the husband. The dream is an indication for the dreamer of the necessity of repentance and getting closer to God before it is too late. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream about the man and its meaning. This vision in a man’s dream represents falling into a great temptation and the inability to Getting out of it. This is in the case that the dead person is unknown to God, and God knows best. Seeing an unknown dead person crying loudly in a man’s dream is not a good thing. It indicates the occurrence of a calamity or hearing unpleasant news, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that his dead father Slapping him in the face. This is a warning to the dreamer to stop his bad deeds, restore rights to their owners, and sympathize with his wife and children. When a man sees that someone has died, he gives him a small child. That is, the dreamer is about to assume a new responsibility in his life that will raise his status and status in his work, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a dead person upset in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a dead mother upset and sad in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is in dire need of her mother to stand by her side, reassure her, and make her feel safe and comfortable. There is another interpretation of this dream, which is that the mother feels her daughter’s pain. But know that Almighty God will not abandon her, and will save her and her fetus, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees a dead person crying in her dream, she may face some problems and difficulties during pregnancy and childbirth, and she must continue to ask for forgiveness. The cry of an unknown dead person in a dream is a bad omen for the loss of the fetus or the birth of a child. Sick. We advise the person with the vision to read the Qur’an a lot and ask for forgiveness. Interpretation of seeing a dead person angry in a dream for young people and its meaning.
